name: Kusa no Bushi
description:
Kusa no bushi is a game where you try to survive as long as you can from waves of raptors trying to kill you. Dodge and kill them with a timed dash attack. The player has only one life and so can only be bitten once. Try to be the one to kill the most.

Use WASD to move your character - SPACE to roll - A/E to attack

asset by : Melki - pixramen - thdy
